title: Z_MBFM
author: Z_MBFM
content: My first Collectib I am very happy to get it in my hand. it is two Bitcoin coin and one is Ethereum coin. All crypto coins including Bitcoin are illegal in my country so it is very difficult to get Bitcoin Collectib here. I am very happy to get them

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: What country do you live in ? Also,   Nice coins

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Glad to see it. Thanks for sharing! If you are willing/if you want to…send me your address and I’ll mail you a free coin to help add to your collection.  I would make sure to send it properly so you don’t have any issues with your government trying to confiscate it. Again, up to you, no big deal if you’ve got privacy concerns or worried about your government intercepting it or whatever. Cheers- Chi

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on September 03, 2023, 02:22:25 PMGlad to see it. Thanks for sharing! If you are willing/if you want to…send me your address and I’ll mail you a free coin to help add to your collection.  I would make sure to send it properly so you don’t have any issues with your government trying to confiscate it. Again, up to you, no big deal if you’ve got privacy concerns or worried about your government intercepting it or whatever. Cheers- Chi     Same here.....if you give Ty your addy then I will send something to him to send to you as well

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Also join us here to try and get lucky for free and add this item loaded with actual BTC to your collection!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465518.0

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.created_time: September 03, 2023, 04:45:52 PMLast edit: September 03, 2023, 05:00:20 PM by Z_MBFM

Also,   Nice coins I am From Bangladesh Quote from: ChiBitCTy on September 03, 2023, 02:22:25 PMIf you are willing/if you want to…send me your address and I’ll mail you a free coin to help add to your collection.  I would make sure to send it properly so you don’t have any issues with your government trying to confiscate it. Of course I want it.  I will discuss the matter with my local community and then decide and message you my address if possible. Thank you very much for your offerQuote from: krogothmanhattan on September 03, 2023, 03:12:59 PM    Same here.....if you give Ty your addy then I will send something to him to send to you as well  Thank you very much for your interest. I am doing this

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: What he does is a heartwarming gesture from the community. I've found incredible support here, especially on Bitcointalk. Thanks to all the kind folks in this community!Quote from: ChiBitCTy on September 03, 2023, 02:22:25 PMGlad to see it. Thanks for sharing! If you are willing/if you want to…send me your address and I’ll mail you a free coin to help add to your collection.  I would make sure to send it properly so you don’t have any issues with your government trying to confiscate it. Again, up to you, no big deal if you’ve got privacy concerns or worried about your government intercepting it or whatever. Cheers- Chi

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: @Z_MBFM - welcome to the collectibles board of the forum, as you can see alreadywe have some of the top members here in the collectibles board, everyone is very helpfuland generous in their own ways from time to time with the exception of krogothmanhattanand with no offence to anyone else,who is on Free Raffle #527 - outstanding!!Anyway, I wish you well with building your collection.Q. how did you get those 3 tokens into the country?Q. are they the common Gold plated tokens? if they are I started with one if those too!!

comments.author: Frank AlpenCoin
comments.body: Welcome! You are at the right place! This forum is amazing!Let me ship Something to ChitBitCTyWould be happy to know that an Alpen Coin is in your collection!

comments.author: MrCryptHodl
comments.body: Welcome Z_MBFM ! Like Frank say, you are clearly at the right place !If I'm not mistaken, one of my coin has already gone to this side of the world! and others country where it's not legal..   Bitcoin is freedom, he don't know border It is with pleasure that I will send you a small gift for the beginning of your collection, just send me your address and I will take care of the rest ! Welcome again to you and have a wonderful day fren !
